issues.description: The solution’s getRides() method in ExcellenceLand returns a Set<Ride> although the attribute is declared as List<Ride> and the problem statement specifies a List<Ride> type. Students will expect a getter returning List<Ride>, so this mismatch can cause confusion or test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of getRides() to List<Ride> and have it return the rides list (or an unmodifiable List) to match the attribute’s type.
